verses.verse: לְמַחְלְק֖וֹת <WH4256> Concerning the divisions לְשֹׁעֲרִ֑ים <WH7778> of the porters לַקָּרְחִ֕ים <WH7145> Of the Korhites מְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֥הוּ <WH4920> [was] Meshelemiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son קֹרֵ֖א <WH6981> of Kore מִן־ <WH4480> at בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the sons אָסָֽף׃ <WH623> of Asaph

וְלִמְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֖הוּ <WH4920> of Meshelemiah בָּנִ֑ים <WH1121> And the sons זְכַרְיָ֤הוּ <WH2148> [were] Zechariah הַבְּכוֹר֙ <WH1060> the firstborn יְדִֽיעֲאֵ֣ל <WH3043> Jediael הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> the second זְבַדְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH2069> Zebadiah הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> the third יַתְנִיאֵ֖ל <WH3496> Jathniel הָרְבִיעִֽי׃ <WH7243> the fourth
עֵילָ֤ם <WH5867> Elam הַחֲמִישִׁי֙ <WH2549> the fifth יְהוֹחָנָ֣ן <WH3076> Jehohanan הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <WH8345> the sixth אֶלְיְהוֹעֵינַ֖י <WH454> Elioenai הַשְּׁבִיעִֽי׃ <WH7637> the seventh

וּלְעֹבֵ֥ד אֱדֹ֖ם <WH5654> of Obededom בָּנִ֑ים <WH1121> Moreover the sons שְׁמַֽעְיָ֤ה <WH8098> [were] Shemaiah הַבְּכוֹר֙ <WH1060> the firstborn יְהוֹזָבָ֣ד <WH3075> Jehozabad הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> the second יוֹאָ֤ח <WH3098> Joah הַשְּׁלִשִׁי֙ <WH7992> the third וְשָׂכָ֣ר <WH7940> and Sacar הָרְבִיעִ֔י <WH7243> the fourth וּנְתַנְאֵ֖ל <WH5417> and Nethaneel הַחֲמִישִֽׁי׃ <WH2549> the fifth

עַמִּיאֵ֤ל <WH5988> Ammiel הַשִּׁשִּׁי֙ <WH8345> the sixth יִשָׂשכָ֣ר <WH3485> Issachar הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> the seventh פְּעֻלְּתַ֖י <WH6469> Peulthai הַשְּׁמִינִ֑י <WH8066> the eighth כִּ֥י <WH3588> had indeed בֵרֲכ֖וֹ <WH1288> blessed אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> for God פ

וְלִֽשְׁמַֽעְיָ֤ה <WH8098> Also unto Shemaiah בְנוֹ֙ <WH1121> his son נוֹלַ֣ד <WH3205> born בָּנִ֔ים <WH1121> were sons הַמִּמְשָׁלִ֖ים <WH4474> that ruled לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> throughout the house אֲבִיהֶ֑ם <WH1> of their father כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גִבּ֥וֹרֵי <WH1368> for they [were] mighty men חַ֖יִל <WH2428> of valour הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> like

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons שְׁמַֽעְיָ֗ה <WH8098> of Shemaiah עָ֠תְנִי <WH6273> Othni וּרְפָאֵ֨ל <WH7501> and Rephael וְעוֹבֵ֧ד <WH5744> and Obed אֶלְזָבָ֛ד <WH443> Elzabad אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> whose brethren בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> men חָ֑יִל <WH2428> [were] strong אֱלִיה֖וּ <WH453> Elihu וּסְמַכְיָֽהוּ׃ <WH5565> and Semachiah

כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner אֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> these מִבְּנֵ֣י ׀ <WH1121> All these of the sons עֹבֵ֣ד אֱדֹ֗ם <WH5654> of Obededom הֵ֤מָּה <WH1992> they וּבְנֵיהֶם֙ <WH1121> they and their sons וַאֲחֵיהֶ֔ם <WH251> and their brethren אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> men חַ֥יִל <WH2428> able בַּכֹּ֖חַ <WH3581> for strength לַעֲבֹדָ֑ה <WH5656> for the service שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> [were] threescore וּשְׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> and two לְעֹבֵ֥ד אֱדֹֽם׃ <WH5654> of Obededom
וְלִמְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֗הוּ <WH4920> And Meshelemiah בָּנִ֧ים <WH1121> had sons וְאַחִ֛ים <WH251> and brethren בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> men חָ֖יִל <WH2428> strong שְׁמוֹנָ֥ה <WH8083> eight עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> teen ס

וּלְחֹסָ֥ה <WH2621> Also Hosah מִן־ <WH4480> at בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children מְרָרִ֖י <WH4847> of Merari בָּנִ֑ים <WH1121> had sons שִׁמְרִ֤י <WH8113> Simri הָרֹאשׁ֙ <WH7218> the chief כִּ֣י <WH3588> לֹא־ <WH3808> not הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> was not בְכ֔וֹר <WH1060> (for [though] he was not the firstborn וַיְשִׂימֵ֥הוּ <WH7760> made אָבִ֖יהוּ <WH1> yet his father לְרֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7218> the first

חִלְקִיָּ֤הוּ <WH2518> Hilkiah הַשֵּׁנִי֙ <WH8145> the second טְבַלְיָ֣הוּ <WH2882> Tebaliah הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֔י <WH7992> the third זְכַרְיָ֖הוּ <WH2148> Zechariah הָרְבִעִ֑י <WH7243> the fourth כָּל־ <WH3605> all בָּנִ֧ים <WH1121> all the sons וְאַחִ֛ים <WH251> and brethren לְחֹסָ֖ה <WH2621> of Hosah שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> three עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> ten

לְ֠אֵלֶּה <WH428> to these מַחְלְק֨וֹת <WH4256> Among these [were] the divisions הַשֹּֽׁעֲרִ֜ים <WH7778> of the porters לְרָאשֵׁ֧י <WH7218> [even] among the chief הַגְּבָרִ֛ים <WH1397> men מִשְׁמָר֖וֹת <WH4931> [having] wards לְעֻמַּ֣ת <WH5980> one against אֲחֵיהֶ֑ם <WH251> another לְשָׁרֵ֖ת <WH8334> to minister בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיַּפִּ֨ילוּ <WH5307> And they cast גוֹרָל֜וֹת <WH1486> lots כַּקָּטֹ֧ן <WH6996> as well the small כַּגָּד֛וֹל <WH1419> as the great לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> according to the house אֲבוֹתָ֖ם <WH1> of their fathers לְשַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> for every gate וָשָֽׁעַר׃ <WH8179> gate פ

וַיִּפֹּ֧ל <WH5307> fell הַגּוֹרָ֛ל <WH1486> And the lot מִזְרָ֖חָה <WH4217> eastward לְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֑הוּ <WH8018> to Shelemiah וּזְכַרְיָ֨הוּ <WH2148> Then for Zechariah בְנ֜וֹ <WH1121> his son יוֹעֵ֣ץ ׀ <WH3289> counsellor בְּשֶׂ֗כֶל <WH7922> a wise הִפִּ֙ילוּ֙ <WH5307> they cast גּֽוֹרָל֔וֹת <WH1486> lots וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> came out גוֹרָל֖וֹ <WH1486> and his lot צָפֽוֹנָה׃ <WH6828> northward ס
לְעֹבֵ֥ד אֱדֹ֖ם <WH5654> To Obededom נֶ֑גְבָּה <WH5045> southward וּלְבָנָ֖יו <WH1121> and to his sons בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house הָאֲסֻפִּֽים׃ <WH624> of Asuppim

לְשֻׁפִּ֤ים <WH8206> To Shuppim וּלְחֹסָה֙ <WH2621> and Hosah לַֽמַּעֲרָ֔ב <WH4628> [the lot came forth] westward עִ֚ם <WH5973> by שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> with the gate שַׁלֶּ֔כֶת <WH7996> Shallecheth בַּֽמְסִלָּ֖ה <WH4546> by the causeway הָעוֹלָ֑ה <WH5927> of the going up מִשְׁמָ֖ר <WH4929> ward לְעֻמַּ֥ת <WH5980> against מִשְׁמָֽר׃ <WH4929> ward

לַמִּזְרָח֮ <WH4217> Eastward הַלְוִיִּ֣ם <WH3881> Levites שִׁשָּׁה֒ <WH8337> [were] six לַצָּפ֤וֹנָה <WH6828> northward לַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> a day אַרְבָּעָ֔ה <WH702> four לַנֶּ֥גְבָּה <WH5045> southward לַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> a day אַרְבָּעָ֑ה <WH702> four וְלָאֲסֻפִּ֖ים <WH624> and toward Asuppim שְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> two שְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> [and] two
לַפַּרְבָּ֖ר <WH6503> At Parbar לַֽמַּעֲרָ֑ב <WH4628> westward אַרְבָּעָה֙ <WH702> four לַֽמְסִלָּ֔ה <WH4546> at the causeway שְׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> [and] two לַפַּרְבָּֽר׃ <WH6503> at Parbar

אֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> These מַחְלְקוֹת֙ <WH4256> These [are] the divisions הַשֹּׁ֣עֲרִ֔ים <WH7778> of the porters לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> among the sons הַקָּרְחִ֖י <WH7145> of Kore וְלִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> and among the sons מְרָרִֽי׃ <WH4847> of Merari

וְֽהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> And of the Levites אֲחִיָּ֗ה <WH281> Ahijah עַל־ <WH5921> had charge אֽוֹצְרוֹת֙ <WH214> [was] over the treasures בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וּלְאֹֽצְר֖וֹת <WH214> and over the treasures הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6944> of the dedicated things

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> [As concerning] the sons לַ֠עְדָּן <WH3936> of Laadan בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> the sons הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּ֜י <WH1649> of the Gershonite לְלַעְדָּ֗ן <WH3936> Laadan רָאשֵׁ֧י <WH7218> chief הָאָב֛וֹת <WH1> fathers לְלַעְדָּ֥ן <WH3936> [even] of Laadan הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּ֖י <WH1649> the Gershonite יְחִיאֵלִֽי׃ <WH3172> [were] Jehieli

בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> The sons יְחִֽיאֵלִ֑י <WH3172> of Jehieli זֵתָם֙ <WH2241> Zetham וְיוֹאֵ֣ל <WH3100> and Joel אָחִ֔יו <WH251> his brother עַל־ <WH5921> had charge אֹצְר֖וֹת <WH214> [which were] over the treasures בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD
לַֽעַמְרָמִי֙ <WH6020> Of the Amramites לַיִּצְהָרִ֔י <WH3325> [and] the Izharites לַֽחֶבְרוֹנִ֖י <WH2276> the Hebronites לָֽעָזִּיאֵלִֽי׃ <WH5817> [and] the Uzzielites

וּשְׁבֻאֵל֙ <WH7619> And Shebuel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son גֵּרְשׁ֣וֹם <WH1647> of Gershom בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> of Moses נָגִ֖יד <WH5057> [was] ruler עַל־ <WH5921> over הָאֹצָרֽוֹת׃ <WH214> of the treasures

וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> And his brethren לֶֽאֱלִיעֶ֑זֶר <WH461> by Eliezer רְחַבְיָ֨הוּ <WH7345> Rehabiah בְנ֜וֹ <WH1121> his son וִֽישַׁעְיָ֤הוּ <WH3470> and Jeshaiah בְנוֹ֙ <WH1121> his son וְיֹרָ֣ם <WH3141> and Joram בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> his son וְזִכְרִ֥י <WH2147> and Zichri בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son [וּשְׁלֹמֹות כ] (וּשְׁלֹמִ֥ית <WH8013> Shelomith ק) בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son

ה֧וּא <WH1931> This שְׁלֹמ֣וֹת <WH8013> Which Shelomith וְאֶחָ֗יו <WH251> and his brethren עַ֣ל <WH5921> had charge כָּל־ <WH3605> of all אֹצְר֤וֹת <WH214> [were] over all the treasures הַקֳּדָשִׁים֙ <WH6944> of the dedicated things אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הִקְדִּ֜ישׁ <WH6942> had dedicated דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> which David הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וְרָאשֵׁ֧י <WH7218> and the chief הָאָב֛וֹת <WH1> fathers לְשָׂרֵֽי־ <WH8269> the captains הָאֲלָפִ֥ים <WH505> over thousands וְהַמֵּא֖וֹת <WH3967> and hundreds וְשָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> and the captains הַצָּבָֽא׃ <WH6635> of the host

מִן־ <WH4480> in הַמִּלְחָמ֥וֹת <WH4421> won in battles וּמִן־ <WH4480> part הַשָּׁלָ֖ל <WH7998> Out of the spoils הִקְדִּ֑ישׁוּ <WH6942> did they dedicate לְחַזֵּ֖ק <WH2388> to maintain לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְכֹ֨ל <WH3605> and all הַֽהִקְדִּ֜ישׁ <WH6942> had dedicated שְׁמוּאֵ֤ל <WH8050> And all that Samuel הָרֹאֶה֙ <WH7200> the seer וְשָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> and Saul בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קִ֔ישׁ <WH7027> of Kish וְאַבְנֵ֣ר <WH74> and Abner בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נֵ֔ר <WH5369> of Ner וְיוֹאָ֖ב <WH3097> and Joab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צְרוּיָ֑ה <WH6870> of Zeruiah כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> everyone הַמַּקְדִּ֔ישׁ <WH6942> [and] whosoever had dedicated עַ֥ל <WH5921> was in יַד־ <WH3027> [any thing it was] under the hand שְׁלֹמִ֖ית <WH8019> of Shelomith וְאֶחָֽיו׃ <WH251> and of his brethren פ

לַיִּצְהָרִ֞י <WH3325> Of the Izharites כְּנַנְיָ֣הוּ <WH3663> Chenaniah וּבָנָ֗יו <WH1121> and his sons לַמְּלָאכָ֤ה <WH4399> business הַחִֽיצוֹנָה֙ <WH2435> [were] for the outward עַל־ <WH5921> for יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> over Israel לְשֹׁטְרִ֖ים <WH7860> for officers וּלְשֹׁפְטִֽים׃ <WH8199> and judges

לַֽחֶבְרוֹנִ֡י <WH2276> [And] of the Hebronites חֲשַׁבְיָהוּ֩ <WH2811> Hashabiah וְאֶחָ֨יו <WH251> and his brethren בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> men חַ֜יִל <WH2428> of valour אֶ֣לֶף <WH505> a thousand וּשְׁבַע־ <WH7651> and seven מֵא֗וֹת <WH3967> hundred עַ֚ל <WH5921> and פְּקֻדַּ֣ת <WH6486> [were] officers יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> among them of Israel מֵעֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> on this side לַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> Jordan מַעְרָ֑בָה <WH4628> westward לְכֹל֙ <WH3605> for all מְלֶ֣אכֶת <WH4399> in all the business יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלַעֲבֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> and in the service הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of the king

לַֽחֶבְרוֹנִי֙ <WH2276> Among the Hebronites יְרִיָּ֣ה <WH3404> [was] Jerijah הָרֹ֔אשׁ <WH7218> the chief לַֽחֶבְרוֹנִ֥י <WH2276> [even] among the Hebronites לְתֹלְדֹתָ֖יו <WH8435> according to the generations לְאָב֑וֹת <WH1> of his fathers בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <WH8141> year הָֽאַרְבָּעִ֜ים <WH705> In the fortieth לְמַלְכ֤וּת <WH4438> of the reign דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> of David נִדְרָ֔שׁוּ <WH1875> they were sought וַיִּמָּצֵ֥א <WH4672> for and there were found בָהֶ֛ם גִּבּ֥וֹרֵי <WH1368> among them mighty men חַ֖יִל <WH2428> of valour בְּיַעְזֵ֥יר <WH3270> at Jazer גִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> of Gilead

וְאֶחָ֣יו <WH251> And his brethren בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> men חַ֗יִל <WH2428> of valour אַלְפַּ֛יִם <WH505> [were] two thousand וּשְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> and seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> chief הָאָב֑וֹת <WH1> fathers וַיַּפְקִידֵ֞ם <WH6485> made rulers דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> David הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> whom king עַל־ <WH5921> of הָראוּבֵנִ֤י <WH7206> over the Reubenites וְהַגָּדִי֙ <WH1425> the Gadites וַחֲצִי֙ <WH2677> and the half שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> tribe הַֽמְנַשִּׁ֔י <WH4520> of Manasseh לְכָל־ <WH3605> all דְּבַ֥ר <WH1697> for every matter הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> pertaining to God וּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> and affairs הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of the king פ
